name: aikido
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a sport, created in Japan as a type of self-defence, in which you hold and throw your opponent and use his or her own movements: Aikido's core philosophy is overcoming opponents without doing them physical harm. I took my kids to aikido practice.
More examplesFewer examplesThe founder of aikido was Morihei Ueshiba, who drew on ancient jujitsu styles.Established over a century ago by a Japanese martial arts master, aikido means "the way of harmony with the universe."Leonard is an aikido master
